title: Silent Hill Publisher Konami Partners With Bloober Team - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.30.21
description:
Silent Hill has hope! Let's talk about that, Control's multiplayer game, and more with Blessing and Andy.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
It’s Tim Gettys birthday today! Go and wish him a happy birthday today on social media.
Our Loki episode 4 reactions just got done recording and will be live on Youtube by the time you’re listening to this episode. So go check that out on Youtube.com/KindaFunny
Right after this live episode of KFGD is another Mario Golf stream on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames. This time it’s featuring Game Attack. Make sure you go check that out right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames or later on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyPlays.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:09:10 - Are we getting a new Silent Hill game from Bloober Team and Konami?
00:17:03 - Are you confident with Konami's pick? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:22:50 - Speaking of Developer-Publisher partnerships, it looks like we’re getting WAY more Control
00:38:00 - A New Mystery Id Software Game Rated in Australia - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:35:30 - Ad
00:45:20 - The Persona Series has hit 15 Million Units Sold Worldwide - Sean Murray @ The Gamer
00:51:50 - Out today
00:54:40 - Gamer Confessions: JoshyG
00:58:06 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim
